languages.text: Ваши кости деформировались и искривились, начали расти под неправильными углами, сделав движения неуклюжими, а тело — незнакомым. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами
Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien. Cannot be removed by regular means
languages.original_text: Ваши кости деформировались и искривились, начали расти под неправильными углами, сделав движения неуклюжими, а тело — незнакомым. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами

traits.locale_text: Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien.
Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien.
Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien. Cannot be removed by regular means
Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien.

Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien.
Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien. Cannot be removed by regular means

languages.text: 骨が変形し、湾曲し、位置がずれているため、動きが不器用になり、体が異質なものに感じられる。 通常の方法では除去できない
languages.original_text: Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 骨が変形し、湾曲し、位置がずれているため、動きが不器用になり、体が異質なものに感じられる。 通常の方法では除去できない

languages.text: 你的骨骼变形、弯曲、错位，你的动作无比笨拙，身体就好像不是自己的一样。 此效果无法通过通常手段移除
languages.original_text: Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 你的骨骼变形、弯曲、错位，你的动作无比笨拙，身体就好像不是自己的一样。

languages.text: Tus huesos se han deformado, curvado y desalineado, haciendo que sus movimientos sean torpes y tu cuerpo se sienta extraño. No se puede curar por medios normales
languages.original_text: Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Tus huesos se han deformado, curvado y desalineado, haciendo que sus movimientos sean torpes y tu cuerpo se sienta extraño.

languages.text: Deine Knochen haben sich deformiert, gekrümmt und verschoben, so dass deine Bewegungen unbeholfen wirken und dein Körper sich fremd anfühlt. Kann mit normalen Mitteln nicht entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Deine Knochen haben sich deformiert, gekrümmt und verschoben, so dass deine Bewegungen unbeholfen wirken und dein Körper sich fremd anfühlt.

languages.text: Vos os déformés, incurvés et désormais mal alignés rendent vos mouvements maladroits et vous donnent l'impression d'habiter un autre corps. Impossible à supprimer par des méthodes ordinaires.
languages.original_text: Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Vos os déformés, incurvés et désormais mal alignés rendent vos mouvements maladroits et vous donnent l'impression d'habiter un autre corps.

languages.text: Kemiklerin deforme olmuş, kıvrılmış ve hizasından sapmış vaziyette. Hareketlerin dengesiz, bedeninse sana yabancı geliyor.
languages.original_text: Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Kemiklerin deforme olmuş, kıvrılmış ve hizada değiller, bu yüzden hareketlerin dengesiz ve bedenin sana yabancı geliyor.

languages.text: Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien. Can't be removed by normal means.

traits.locale_text: Your bones have deformed, curved, and misaligned, making your movements clumsy and your body feel alien. Can't be removed by normal means.
